Notes: Required field - 'yes' or 'no' indicating if witnesses were present at the accident
First witness full name - Required if witnesses_present = 'yes' (min 3 characters)
First witness phone number - Optional but recommended (UK format)
First witness email address - Optional alternative contact method
What the witness saw - Required if witnesses_present = 'yes' (max 1000 chars, min 10 required)
Reused session ID from Page 6 - Shared across all pages for temp upload tracking
Array of additional witnesses (witness 2, 3+) stored in sessionStorage - Each contains: witness_number, witness_name, witness_mobile_number, witness_email_address, witness_statement, saved_at
Witness index number (1, 2, 3, etc.) - Generated for each additional witness in the array
Timestamp when witness was saved to sessionStorage - ISO format (e.g., '2025-01-15T14:30:00.000Z')
Character count display showing current/max characters in witness statement (e.g., '250 / 1000 characters')
